sentences.sContent: an attempt to mobilize popular opinion
a campaign to mobilize support for the strike
sentences.sCn: 动员大家支持罢工的宣传活动

sentences.sContent: The physiotherapist mobilizes the patient’s shoulder.
sentences.sCn: 物理治疗师帮助病人活动肩膀

synos.tran: 动员，调动；集合，组织；使…流通；使…松动

words.tran: 机动的；易变的，；非固定的

trans.tranCn: (mobilise)动员,赋予可动性；赋予可动性
trans.tranOther: to encourage people to support something in an active way
